snippet: Republican lawmakers assailed new exemptions from antiterrorism laws the Obama administration issued this week for war zone refugees seeking to come to the United States.
abstract: Republican lawmakers are assailing new exemptions from antiterrorism laws the Obama administration issued for war zone refugees seeking to come to the United States; say rules are examples of unilateral action by Pres Obama that weaken immigration security.
lead_paragraph: Republican lawmakers assailed new exemptions from antiterrorism laws the Obama administration issued this week for war zone refugees seeking to come to the United States.

headline.main: Republicans Criticize Rules to Aid Syrians Seeking Asylum
headline.print_headline: Rules to Aid Asylum-Seeking Refugees Are Called Security Threat
